notes.p: FB, MR, ARC, RB designed the study; FB provided patient samples; UV, ST and ME carried out the PCR and sequencing experiments; RB and ARC performed phylogenetic and statistical analysis; EM and PC carried out the serological assays; GP carried out Real-Time PCR quantification; RB, ST, AC, SD, MR, FB and ARC analysed and interpreted the data; RB prepared visualization of data; ST, MR and RB drafted the manuscript; RB and ARC critically reviewed and edited the draft. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
